DOC.brief_summary: The investigators wish to investigate the effects of neuromuscular stimulation on intermittent claudication.
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation in Peripheral Arterial Disease
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of stable intermittent claudication (>6 months) with confirmation by medical imaging ABPI<0.9 Absolute walking distance <500m Pregnancy Cardiac pacemaker Previous lower limb major amputation
